alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 12:24PM CST until January 03 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CST FOR CUMBERLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN FENTRESS COUNTIES... At 1224 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Fairfield Glade, or 14 miles north of Crossville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crossville, Fairfield Glade, Crab Orchard, Pleasant Hill, Grimsley, Lake Tansi, Cumberland Mountain State Park, Slate Springs and Clarkrange. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 306 and 340. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
